name: Marvin Rigs It All!
description:
I created this game during lockdown 2020 while learning to code! It's a puzzle game based on a task I used to do daily: rigging lighting fixtures onto trusses. Marvin is based on a real lampie who had a reputation for getting the job done quickly. 

Hopefully it will bring you a smile and some satisfaction as you complete all the (admittedly bizarre) lighting trusses!

The original release had a leaderboard. I could never get below 3 minutes, but one guy from NYC called Jaydn managed a 2:24!

As I sit here, I've been working full time mainly using web technologies for the last 3 years, so I can safely say this game led to some big changes in my life and a new future building things in the virtual world.
